Just noticed this on Aurora - here's a brief build log:

http://tinderbox.mozilla.org/showlog.cgi?log=Thunderbird-Aurora/1318873023.1318873775.22249.gz

standard8@mozilla.com
comments.author: standard8@mozilla.com
comments.text: Yeah, this started about the time we landed the building & enabling of test pilot. I'm not yet sure why it only happens on aurora. I was hoping Jim might have some ideas as to the solution.
comments.raw_text: Yeah, this started about the time we landed the building & enabling of test pilot. I'm not yet sure why it only happens on aurora. I was hoping Jim might have some ideas as to the solution.

comments.creator: jporterbugs@gmail.com
comments.author: jporterbugs@gmail.com
comments.text: Ah, right. The Aurora and Beta channels use a different UI for Test Pilot; namely an extra toolbar button on the main toolbar. I'm not sure of the best way to handle this though. Maybe specialize the test based on the release channel?
comments.raw_text: Ah, right. The Aurora and Beta channels use a different UI for Test Pilot; namely an extra toolbar button on the main toolbar. I'm not sure of the best way to handle this though. Maybe specialize the test based on the release channel?

comments.creator: standard8@mozilla.com
comments.text:
(In reply to Jim Porter (:squib) from comment #2)
> Ah, right. The Aurora and Beta channels use a different UI for Test Pilot;
> namely an extra toolbar button on the main toolbar. I'm not sure of the best

Yes, I think that would be best.
